Text.Page:
Someone brought a bunch of arachnens to Frostclaw Crag. No one's sure who, but given their nasty dispositions, we know why.

We have enough trouble without some fool arcanist spawning more for us, so kill 'em quick!

Well, it's a start. I'll see if I can talk Thenuvia into putting a bounty on the arachnens. That'll bring hunters to do some of the dirty work for us.

Well done!
